server.database

Class UserDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.database.UserDAO

  • public class UserDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    The data access object responsible for user information

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assignImageToUser(Image image, User user)
      Assign an image (batch) to a user, so that image won't be assigned to anyone else

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password)
        Validate that the user exists, given the username and password. If the username and password are correct, return a User object corresponding to that user, otherwise return null.
        Parameters:
        username - String representing the user's username
        password - String representing the user's password
        Returns:
        the user with the given username and password (null if invalid)

      • assignImageToUser

        public void assignImageToUser(Image image,
                     User user)
        Assign an image (batch) to a user, so that image won't be assigned to anyone else
        Parameters:
        image - Image object to assign
        user - User object to assign image to

      • updateUserRecordCount

        public void updateUserRecordCount(User user)
        Update a user's indexed record count
        Parameters:
        user - the User object for the user to be updated

      • createUser

        public void createUser(User user)
        Given a User object, create a new entry in the users table in the database for that user
        Parameters:
        user - the User to add to the database
